alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 15 at 5:01PM MST until October 15 at 5:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 545 PM MST. * At 501 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Florence Junction to Magma to near Blackwater to near Coolidge, moving north at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Mesa, Gilbert, Apache Junction, Coolidge, Gold Canyon, Queen Creek, Blackwater, Chandler Heights, Gold Camp, Lost Dutchman State Park, Goldfield, Magma, San Tan Village Mall, San Tan Valley and Seville. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 190 and 217. AZ Route 87 between mile markers 134 and 149. AZ Route 202 between mile markers 29 and 41. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
